cleaned_text: Want to Upgrade Your Experience? Includes: Ayurvedic Herbs to detoxify tissues and facilitate elimination. Prebiotic fibers to support the gut microbiome. Ingestible plant-based oil for anti-inflammatory support and detoxification. 14 days of daily instruction, recipe book and supportive mind-body practices. Allow two weeks for the whole experience: one week for the pre-cleanse and one week for the detox. Be sure to order your Detox Kit one week before the intended week of use to allow for the preparatory phase.
